text: The phone that arrived was not usable on Verizon network.  Went to Verizon store and clerk says I need an A1660 or an A1661 model.  I am returning it.  I noticed now that the detailed info on this item does not state what the model is.  I am returning it.
Excellent buy.  Didn’t have any problems with activation.  It was unlocked for Verizon.

The iPhone 7 came on time.  Took it to Verizon, tried to update iPhone....could not do it.  Tried 2 sim cards...did not work..called Verizon support team..could not get it to work (NO SERVICE)  Was told by Verizon to send back.  Hopefully, I willget my money back....Also brought protective cover, but did not need to, as the iPhone already came with one on the phone.
Arrived promptly. Works great. I had no issues activating with Verizon. It had several scratches on the back but those are covered by the case anyway. I am very pleased with this purchase.

So far I am very happy with this purchase.  The iPhone 7 arrived when promised.  It is in great physical condition -- no scratches on screen or back.  I was able to easily activate on the Verizon network.  The battery max life indicator says 89% -- which is good for a used phone.
Arrived promptly in good condition and no trouble to set up with verizon- so far so good

While I was hesitant to buy a used phone, I needed to add a new line to my Verizon account for my husband was use to using this phone and new ones were a lot higher. This phone works great and was indeed unlocked when we went to Verizon to set up his line.
Phone works well - could have replaced the screen, there were multiple scratches.
Work fine for 3 months now just going bonkers not working correctly. They timed their warranty perfectly. Disappointed I purchased this for my wife.....

Everything but the actual cell service worked on the phone I received. This makes the cell phone not function as a phone. I am very surprised that this was not tested before hand. I have taken it to Verizon and Apple. Both told me I was basically out of luck. The seller needs to take the time for QA and QC measures. Poor business model.

Got the phone in the mail, spent half hour trying to switch to this phone gave up and called technical support for verizon.  After almost 2 hours and trying at least a dozen different things I had to get transferred to apple.  Apple then tells me I bought a phone that cant have service on it due to a "recall" so we have to send the phone to apple who will have it for up to 6 weeks to repair it.I bought an expensive paperweight at this time...I thought about sending it back, but my daughter really wants it so to apple for repairs it goes.

Don’t be fooled by the allure of the decent price. This product is low quality. They tell you the item is refurbished but they’d be better served saying we paid some college student $50 hit factory reset and then sold it to you for $200.When I got the product there was scoring on the back of the phone (which is expected of a used product, that’s fair), but the speaker is muffled. What’s the point of buying a phone you can hardly talk on. That should have been caught in the so called refurbishing process.

The matte black iPhone 7 that I received is in perfect functional and cosmetic condition. At $150 for the 32GB, I saved $200 over what Verizon was charging for a new unit. The only downside is that the battery is at 81% compared to new, so I'll have to spend $50 to have the battery replaced about a year from now -- but that was expected and not a big deal. I estimated that I had a 25% chance of getting something unacceptable, but my experience with this Amazon Renewed product is excellent.
Product worked for a week then lost ability for cellular communication. Attempt was made to swap out for a new device, company didn't respond. Had to get refund and get phone elsewhere
Worked fine for a couple of days, then would not connect to provider or read SIM card...currently waiting for refund

Looks like new.  Activated on Verizon with no problems.  Item was as described.  Love it.  Update: 3 weeks into use, item began shutting off, failed to work.  Good thing theres a 90 day guarantee.  I needed it.

This phone worked well for a few months. The cellular service stopped working thereafter. The seller took my return and refunded me because it was still within the return period. While it was disappointing that it stopped working, I was very pleased that they refunded me.
Wouldn't work for verizon

It’s a good phone for sure for sure my only problem is that it’s literally silver and now black like it advertised it to be...kinda disappointed honestly but other then that it works completely fine. SIM cards work I can call and text do all my business it just bugs me it came silver
The phones are the ones that have been returned for have the iPhone seven service defect check IMEI number with apple before putting service and keeping it

Everything about this purchase turned out so well.  I was hesitant to buy a "renewed" phone but its great.  The only thing is the thumbprint, worked for a while but now it doesnt.  Its no big deal and i can probably do it again just havent.
Really easy to connect to the Verizon Network. Have has this phone for months now with no issues! :)

Dead On Arrival.....Phone was as described, turned on, connected to WiFi, but would not read/recognize a SIM card or connect to network, Verizon store tried multiple Sims and sim-trays."Certified" phone purchase description stated refund or replacement in there were issues.....Replacement was not available(Hard to believe no other IP7 was available), so refund only option which they did with little hassle.
The volume is set low and I cannot increase it. I am hearing impaired so I am looking to return this phone.

Phone looks awesome, no major scratches or cracks. Battery was 85% capacity and running at full efficiency which is great for a used phone. Had no problem putting in my SIM card signing in to iCloud, and getting it all set up with Verizon. Super happy.
Works as it should. No issues with battery. Would buy again.
The phone itself works very well when you know how to work it! This is the first time for a smart phone and had to take lessons from Verizon in order to understand how to use it.
Would order from them again. Very helpful answering my questions. Very pleased. My son is very happy.
Phone wasn't unlocked.
Works great! Came on time as expected, and even came with a glass screen protector.Charger cable and wall port included!

When I took it to the Verizon store to get a SIM card they said this batch of model numbers had issues connecting to the server so therefore I have a phone that is useless. Battery life is extremely poor also.
Was a little scared after reading reviews but was as described and works well
The phone arrived a day early and is in excellent condition.  It was no issue getting it activated and getting all my data and apps up and running on the new phone.  Very happy with my purchase/
Horrible he didn’t unlock it
Huge waste of my time didn’t work and had no battery life

SIM card reader is bad it will not recognize the SIM cardWould have thought this would have been tested before reselling hope to hear back from sellerHeard back from seller all was taken care of awesome customer service.
Bought as a gift for someone.  No issues.
Like new condition. Very satisfied.
I had to return the phone because  it wouldn't work.
Works like a dream. Verizon had it linked up to my old number in less than ten minutes. Love this phone.
iPhone 7 is in great like new shape and the price is so cheap I might buy a second phone. Condition 10/10 and price was $149.99. Will buy again
Great phone for the price! The setup was easy and my kid loves it!
It is easy to put in on yourself, and the instructions is easy to follow. The best thing, everything works and way cheaper than i phone store
I don’t like the screen size because I was of the impression that the screen size would be bigger than I got
So far no problems
Perfect! Exactly what I wanted and it’s in amazing condition! Works great with Verizon too!
My boyfriend loves it, one bad thing is battery life doesn’t last long :/
Easy to switch there SIM cards and set everything up. Works like new. Thanks
Bought it for my son. He loves it!
These work as good as Brand new!
Overall a good phone, battery is a little weak but for the price you can’t complain.
Dead battery
It’s a very nice phone. It looks brand new but I actually liked my i6 a lot more. I guess I just have to get use to it.
Its battery is not good. Drains faster
The rating I just submitted was for a different vendor/item.  Sorry for the mistake.
It was suppose to be Black but it’s silver
Great deal considering buying a new iPhone from a Verizon store would cost hundreds more
Todo muy bn excelente producto
Not one complaint here. Extremely happy with seller and product 5 stars
Great shape and well packaged. Very happy with this purchase.
Phone is not as advertised. Battery life is poor. Not a Verizon phone
Bought for my daughter. She's happy.
No comment
Low battery life and some glitches. To be expected
Very nice product!!
The battery isn’t good on this phone
Works very good
Love everything
Everything works like new!
Love my new iPhone
Very good phone I like
It good
Barilly here incoming calls

The model A1660 iPhone 7 has a known bug in a small percentage (its way more then Apple will admit) the phone will not activate with a new carrier and will show “no service” in the top left.  Due to some part of a logic board that fails. So if you receive a A1660 model phone and this happens it’s not your fault it’s a common issue you just need to send it back.  Hope this helps some of you took me a while to get to the bottom.

Most important, it was UNLOCKED VERIZON just as described...in good condition and came in a short amount of time.  Maybe it is just a learning curve for me , but the touch aspect when I use voice texting seems to need to be touched two or three times.  We will see.  Only activated for about 5 days.  Otherwise, I love it.
Phone arrived in perfect condition.  Battery life 100%.  Screen protector included.  Surprised at the exceptional condition of the exterior.  Operating without any faults.
Phone ended up having to be replaced by my carrier as a goodwill gesture. Phone would display “no service” in and out every few minutes. Dropped calls constantly.
We purchased for my son and it works great!
These people were a joy to work with.  They got the phone out early to us.
Phone works great.
Good phone
As described, thank
had phone a week so far good as new
